name: Luke Stogsdill
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Full Stack Developer with 2+ years of experience building high-performance web apps and practical backend systems. Strong focus on clean architecture, fast load times, and turning rough concepts into polished, production-quality products.

skills.items: React, Next.js, Svelte5, TanStack Query, TypeScript
Node.js, Golang, Python, C++, oRPC, Convex

achievements.text: Delivered lightweight, SEO-optimized static sites achieving perfect PageSpeed scores
Improved client sites with faster load times, modern UI, and clearer information flow
Implemented CMS editing so clients can manage content without developer involvement
Shipped production websites and polished demos across medical, service, and event niches

experience.title: Contract Developer

achievements.text: Engineered a microservice for IoT devices that processed and updated alert states as new events entered PostgreSQL
Implemented a PostgreSQL listen/notify workflow with caching to reduce repeated queries and improve responsiveness
Built an operator dashboard to review alert history and monitor device status from a unified interface

experience.tech: Next.js, Golang, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Docker, Hetzner Cloud

projects.name: Sibyl - Daily Morality Quiz

achievements.text: Developed a daily quiz platform with smooth response tracking and user comparison features
Added AI-driven insight generation to highlight behavioral patterns
Implemented the full frontend, backend, and reactive data flow

projects.tech: React, TypeScript, Convex, TanStack Query, oRPC

projects.name: AI VTuber Content Creator

achievements.text: Architected an automated pipeline that parses video frames and WhisperX transcripts to extract context and timing
Generated LLM-driven character reactions with synthesized speech aligned to motion data from a Live2D model
Automated final production by compositing the character, synced audio, and subtitles onto the original footage

projects.tech: React, Python, C++, Live2D Cubism SDK, WhisperX, OpenAI API
